# Welcome {-}

This is the textbook for the course *Data Science for the World* (CSC100) taught at the University of Miami.

## Colophon {-}

This book was written in [bookdown](http://bookdown.org/) inside [RStudio](http://www.rstudio.com/ide/). The website is hosted with [Netlify](https://www.netlify.com), and built from [source](https://github.com/jerrybonnell/ds4everyone) by [GitHub Actions](https://github.com/features/actions).
